product_name: Marmot PreCip Full-Zip Rain Pants - Women's Short
long_description: The women's short-length Marmot PreCip Full-Zip Rain Pants with new NanoPro(TM) fabric are waterproof, windproof and more breathable than ever. Full-length side zips allow quick venting and on/off. NanoPro coated fabric is 43% more breathable than the previous PreCip technology, keeping you drier and more comfortable. Pants are lightweight, durable and compressible; 100% taped seams help seal out the elements. DryTouch finish next to the skin reduces condensation and that sticky, clammy feeling. Full-length side zippers have bonded storm flaps for weather protection. Zippered hand pockets and 1 zippered back pocket. The women's short-length Marmot PreCip Full-Zip Rain Pants have an elastic waist for comfort.
short_description: The women's short-length Marmot PreCip Full-Zip Rain Pants with new NanoPro(TM) fabric are waterproof, windproof and more breathable than ever. Full-length side zips allow quick venting and on/off.
